content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), a boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0), and a steam engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Connected by pipe groups at positions (x=107.5, y=-34.5) and (x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5) and transport belts at positions (x=63.5, y=-53.5) and (x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
* Errors when using burner entities without fuel
  - Ensure that burner entities have a fuel source before using them
* Errors when using stone furnaces without ingredients
  - Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients before using them
* Errors when using steam engines without connection
  - Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power source before using them
* Errors when using electricity groups without being plugged into an electric network
  - Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network before using them
* Errors when using belt groups without input
  - Ensure that belt groups have an input source before using them

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
